description: Grammarly is the world's most popular AI writing assistant, checking grammar, style, tone, and clarity across all your writing tools. Grammarly is the leading AI writing assistant used by 30 million+ daily users. It provides real-time grammar, spelling, punctuation, style, and tone suggestions across email, Google Docs, Office, social media, and more. Grammarly Business adds team style guides and brand voice. GrammarlyGO adds generative AI for rewriting and drafting content. Highlights: Works across virtually all writing surfaces. Real-time suggestions as you type. Tone and clarity feedback. GrammarlyGO for AI generation. Browser extension available.
